original_title: 『教師失格』帰宅困難になったあの日、嵐が過ぎるまでひたすら男子生徒とハメまくりました…。 三上悠亜 （ブルーレイディスク）
overview: Yua is a teacher at this boy’s school, and this one day a heavy storm breaks off leaving everyone is unable to return home. This turned out to be the perfect ice-breaker for her to approach one of her students who she has a crush on.
title: Poor Teacher – Trapped At School During A Storm, She Fucks Her Male Students Until The Weather Clears… – Yua Mikami
